WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing old Fixed defects.... Esp. since there's been quite a few builds since these were marked fixed.  Any new instances of those issues should be created in new defects.
WorkItem.Description:
Since DK Tanks are very CD dependent, the only reasonable way to integrate their CDs into their rotation is to move them from a % uptime model to an integration with shot rotation.  Also to include other trinket activations over the duration of a longer fight.  I'm not sure if the ProtWarr/ProtPaly/ProtDruid stuff works this way, but I've seen it for the healer models to help them manage mana regen and such.  
Â 
This way I can include Anti-Magic Shell for magic-heavy fights, and we can get a better sense for Unholy vs. Frost vs. Blood tanks based on talents.  (Someone may have 2 tanking specs one for heavy physical fights, and one that includes Anti-magic sphere for magic heavy fights.

Comments.Message: I have some ways to adjust how the fight works.  I'm relatively satisfied w/ this for now.  I'm sure it will require more work and re-work, but I'm closing this as fixed for now.  Bug fixes for this feature will be new issues.
